subject: Olympic Games
lead_paragraph: The race for the 2022 Winter Olympics will be a six-city contest: Almaty, Kazakhstan; Beijing; Krakow, Poland; Lviv, Ukraine; Oslo; and Stockholm.
snippet: The race for the 2022 Winter Olympics will be a six-city contest: Almaty, Kazakhstan; Beijing; Krakow, Poland; Lviv, Ukraine; Oslo; and Stockholm.
